thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: Thomas L Moore
thread.title_full: Futonland reviewed by Thomas L Moore

author: Thomas L Moore
title: Thomas L Moore
text: Had a great experience purchasing my first futon. Kelvin took his time to help me try practically every mattress and futon until we found the best one for me. He was knowledgeable of the products and really helped me to stay within budget. After I slept on it, it was definitely worth every penny. Thanks sir!
